articles.content:
Dolly Parton is fully vaccinated after getting her second dose of the Moderna shot to combat COVID-19.  
The legendary 75-year-old songstress joked she got a 'second dose of her own medicine' after … [+3075 chars]

articles.title: Boris Johnson to open up international travel? What the PM is likely to say on Easter Monday - The Independent
articles.description: People who have had both jabs likely to present a lower risk to UK population than those who have not
